subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Chris Kreider’s game-winning goal against the Bruins was a fitting moment of triumph. Kreider was a playoff star last spring, scoring the winner when the Rangers faced Game 6 elimination against Ottawa.
snippet: Chris Kreider’s game-winning goal against the Bruins was a fitting moment of triumph. Kreider was a playoff star last spring, scoring the winner when the Rangers faced Game 6 elimination against Ottawa.
